knimeNode.name: Qvx Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads different QVX file formats and converts them into a readable table format with a two-dimensional array

intro.p: Reads qvx files from local file system. Upon execution, the node will read the table header information and output the data into a KNIME data table.

fullDescription.option: Enter a valid file name, or select a file from the "Browse" dialog. The supported file format is .qvx.

ports.outPort: KNIME table reads different field attributes from a .qvx file.
